summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6082 for the improvement of 43rd Avenue South from Othello Street to Webster Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83712, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
